description: The AWS::EC2::SubnetCidrBlock resource creates association between subnet and IPv6 CIDR

Ipv6CidrBlock.description: The IPv6 network range for the subnet, in CIDR notation. The subnet size must use a /64 prefix length
Ipv6CidrBlock.markdownDescription:
The IPv6 network range for the subnet, in CIDR notation. The subnet size must use a /64 prefix length

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 42  
Update requires: Replacement

Ipv6IpamPoolId.description: The ID of an IPv6 Amazon VPC IP Address Manager (IPAM) pool from which to allocate, to get the subnet's CIDR
Ipv6IpamPoolId.markdownDescription:
The ID of an IPv6 Amazon VPC IP Address Manager (IPAM) pool from which to allocate, to get the subnet's CIDR

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

Ipv6NetmaskLength.description: The netmask length of the IPv6 CIDR to allocate to the subnet from an IPAM pool
Ipv6NetmaskLength.markdownDescription:
The netmask length of the IPv6 CIDR to allocate to the subnet from an IPAM pool

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: Replacement

SubnetId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the subnet

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

Id.markdownDescription:
Information about the IPv6 association.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Ipv6AddressAttribute.description: The value denoting whether an IPv6 Subnet CIDR Block is public or private.
Ipv6AddressAttribute.markdownDescription:
The value denoting whether an IPv6 Subnet CIDR Block is public or private.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

IpSource.description: The IP Source of an IPv6 Subnet CIDR Block.
IpSource.markdownDescription:
The IP Source of an IPv6 Subnet CIDR Block.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
